text:
@vanguardngrnews I find this tweet ridiculously funny... Coronavirus has exposed the inefficiencies of Nigerian Government in funding Research. 💯 periodt.
Let the government #professionalizeMICROBIOLOGY and provide enabling environment for our researchers.
